tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quality_control (
  audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  audit_date DATE,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
  inspection_result VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE QualityControlAudits (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(50),
    audit_date DATE,
    audit_result VARCHAR(20),
    audit_comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Inspections (
    inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspection_result VARCHAR(20),
    inspection_comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE audit_results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_id INT,
    passed BOOLEAN,
    remarks TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (audit_id) REFERENCES quality_control_audit(id)
);

CREATE TABLE inspection_results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_id INT,
    passed BOOLEAN,
    remarks TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (inspection_id) REFERENCES inspection(id)
);
